```{r fig.cap="Map of Ukraine"}
library(leaflet)

dataMap <- leaflet() %>% addProviderTiles(providers$Wikimedia) %>%
  setView(lng = 32.7670, lat = 48.8120, zoom = 5)
dataMap

# 48.812028, 32.766993
```
